title: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee Casts Off: The Yarn Harlot's Guide to the Land of Knitting
description: Cast off with Stephanie Pearl-McPhee on the ultimate journey through the knitterâ€™s world. Pack your crafting bag, chart a course to the nearest yarn shop, and pick your traveling companion by looking for the telltale needle holes in her purse. With wry humor and a contagiously obsessive love for everything knitted, Pearl-McPhee takes you on a hilarious tour of the Land of Knitting and introduces you to the wacky, wonderful people that choose to inhabit it.
author: Stephanie Pearl-McPhee
